member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.#ctor(Dalamud.Plugin.DalamudPluginInterface,Dalamud.Game.Framework,Dalamud.Game.Command.CommandManager,Dalamud.Game.Gui.GameGui,Dalamud.Game.Gui.Toast.ToastGui)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.AssemblyLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets AssemblyLocation. When loaded by LivePluginLoader, the executing assembly will be wrong. Supplying this property allows LivePluginLoader to supply the correct location, so that you have full compatibility when loaded normally and through LPL.

member.name: T:Echoglossian.Properties.Resources
